/hpc2hdd/home/xhao390/py/urbanclip/data/: The image captures a panoramic view of a bustling street in Beijing, China. The perspective is from a low angle, giving a sense of the city's towering presence. The sky above is a clear blue, providing a vibrant backdrop to the urban landscape below. Buildings of various sizes and designs line the street, their facades reflecting the architectural diversity of the city. Power lines crisscross above, connecting the buildings and adding a dynamic element to the scene. In the distance, a bridge stretches across the street, connecting different parts of the city. The image is bathed in the bright sunlight of the day, highlighting the colors and details of the cityscape.
